uno.network.api

Interface IServerMessageListener

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    GameServer, TestServer

    public interface IServerMessageListener
    The listener interface for receiving events from the network thread
    Version:
    06-03-2017
    Author:
    Gustaf JÃ¤rgren

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void onMessageReceived(Player player, MessageType type, java.lang.Object data)
      Called when a message from a player is received
      void onPlayerConnect(Player player)
      Called when a player has been connected to the sever and before all the connection messages are sent
      void onPlayerDisconnect(Player player, boolean expected)
      Called when a player is disconnected for any reason
      If the disconnect was unexpected the player could have crashed or lost the connection
      An expected disconnect only happens if the player sends a message about it beforehand
      boolean onPrePlayerConnect(java.net.Socket socket)
      Called before the connection to the player is saved but after the check if there is room for the client

    • Method Detail

      • onPrePlayerConnect

        boolean onPrePlayerConnect(java.net.Socket socket)
        Called before the connection to the player is saved but after the check if there is room for the client
        Parameters:
        socket - The socket that tries to connect to the server
        Returns:
        True if the connection is allowed to connect or false if not

      • onPlayerConnect

        void onPlayerConnect(Player player)
        Called when a player has been connected to the sever and before all the connection messages are sent
        Parameters:
        player - The player that connected

      • onPlayerDisconnect

        void onPlayerDisconnect(Player player,
                        boolean expected)
        Called when a player is disconnected for any reason
        If the disconnect was unexpected the player could have crashed or lost the connection
        An expected disconnect only happens if the player sends a message about it beforehand
        Parameters:
        player - The player that was disconnected
        expected - If the disconnect was expected or not

      • onMessageReceived

        void onMessageReceived(Player player,
                       MessageType type,
                       java.lang.Object data)
        Called when a message from a player is received
        Parameters:
        player - The player that sent the message
        type - The type of the message
        data - The data that was sent with the message
